html:
5.8.17  10:08 am   Is HoTEWIG finished?

     i can't tell you

5.8.17  10:06 am   Do you secretly have super secret secrets, secretly?

     if i did then i don't think i would be able to tell you

5.8.17  9:18 am   Do set a specific time of day to work at, or do you just work whenever you feel in the mood?

     i work during all of the available time

5.8.17  8:54 am   might hotewig be the craziest thing you've ever done so far?

     yes

5.8.17  8:32 am   what field of expertise is required to access the expert mode of the website?

     none

5.8.17  8:28 am   at what point in the song writing process do you usually decide on a name

     whenever it becomes obvious. or if it does not become obvious by the end, then i will have to figure something out

5.8.17  8:16 am   After this new video youre working on is uploaded, are you going to continue making videos, or disappear for another 10 months?

     i have never disappeared for 10 months. but i will continue working on videos and/or music, non stop, just as i have been for the past several years

5.8.17  8:11 am   Have all your post on Instagram so far been teasers for the same video?

     all of them since september

5.8.17  7:50 am   how do I become attractive to my target demographic

     i think it works better if you choose your target demographic based on who already would find you attractive, the way you really are

5.8.17  7:16 am   Do you think people understand how to be patient?

     perhaps some people do, and some people don't. perhaps some people are just getting the hang of it

5.8.17  6:31 am   huiahuihewlklkfgkldfngjnreknkgjer? thanks, heuwi

     i will see what i can do

5.8.17  5:35 am   How do we keep on living after realizing the irreversible mistakes we have made?

     i don't know but it might help to remember that everyone who has ever accomplished anything has surely made irreversible mistakes before that
5.8.17  5:19 am   will you make more history lessons?

5.8.17  4:42 am   is 'fucker' a term of endearment?

     in some areas

5.8.17  4:32 am   why does the world map not have the right proportions?

     if you try to show a sphere map on a flat surface, it is going to be inaccurate no matter which way you do it. the only way to really get it right is to put it on a sphere

5.8.17  4:23 am   does hotewig include the number 6 at all?

     i don't think so

5.8.17  4:18 am   hey i'm so topical, so let me ask such a topical question, are you going to vote for trump or hillary in the 2016 election?

     no

5.8.17  4:16 am   do you like tuesdays?

     they are ok

5.8.17  2:04 am   what is the answer to the multiple choice question in i'm crazy / it's raining

     i don't remember what the question was
5.8.17  1:50 am   why haven't you uploaded anything in a while

5.8.17  1:21 am   If you insulted the clothing of the guy who proved that light was an electromagnetic wave, you could summarize that by saying "Wurtz hurts Hertz' shirts." Does this seem like an accurate description of your life?

     no

5.8.17  1:10 am   what's your favourite move to stun your unsuspecting opponent with at a dance-off?

     having good morals

5.8.17  1:08 am   Have you ever had a dream where you heard a crazy good song somewhere and you got all jealous, only to wake up and realize you can take all the credit for it?

     oh hell yeah

     On a side note, could you actually still remember a song you dreamt of?

     i just try to get down as much as i can

5.8.17  1:07 am   Can you visit yourself?

     ah that's a great question. i think you can

5.8.17  1:00 am   what is the meaning of your life ?

      try to express infinite ideas, in a finite amount of time and space

5.8.17  12:51 am   Can you provide me with a detailed first- and second-level analysis of John Cage's 4'33''?

     he didn't invent that, but for some reason he gets all the credit for it

5.8.17  12:42 am   why is college an expensive way to prove you are willing to give years of your life to a business?

     because how else are you gonna prove it
5.8.17  12:34 am   Has anyone really been far as decided to use even go want to do look more like?

5.8.17  12:18 am   I was torn between loving complexity and craving simplicity. After much consternation, the answer to which I eventually came was to "simply be complex." Do you believe this is an acceptable mantra by which to live?

     sure, but i'm not sure if it will last. i find it's best to look at simple and complex as a dialogue, constantly going back and forth. each one is sort of the answer to the other

5.8.17  12:09 am   Can you give me a good question to ask you?

     no

5.7.17  11:26 pm   should i worry

     you can if you want

5.7.17  10:58 pm   does hotewig explain how the earth originated from pineapples?

     no

5.7.17  10:53 pm   what are the instructions I need to follow to meet people to fall in love with?

     i don't know

5.7.17  10:26 pm   what party are you associated with

     none

5.7.17  10:17 pm   do you have a further plan to stay uploading on youtube?

     yes, my plan is to upload most of the videos i make to youtube, as long as youtube still exists

5.7.17  10:14 pm   what do i put in this box

     a question, or perhaps something else

5.7.17  10:12 pm   Is art dead

     no

5.7.17  10:11 pm   what's your favorite subject

     how to figure out what the hell is going on

5.7.17  10:11 pm   Can I blink

     you will have to try and see
5.7.17  10:10 pm   Am I cool
5.7.17  10:09 pm   This is a statement

5.7.17  10:08 pm   Do you like any of the things

     oh hell yeah
5.7.17  10:08 pm   Favorite band?

5.7.17  10:08 pm   Do you like rulers

     they are ok

5.7.17  10:07 pm   Do you like turquoise

     it's ok

5.7.17  10:06 pm   do you consider your song "school" good advice for people who aren't stupid?

     yes
5.7.17  10:05 pm   How do you deal with stress
5.7.17  10:04 pm   When did you start making music
5.7.17  10:03 pm   What is the point of existence
5.7.17  10:03 pm   Why do you exist
